title: GA Legacy Cookie Parser
name: ga-legacy-cookie-parser-js
author: Matthias Isler <mi@matthias-isler.ch>
description: A workaround for accessing GA data in Universal Analytics environments.

scripts.build: node_modules/babel-cli/bin/babel.js src -d build && node_modules/uglify-js/bin/uglifyjs build/ga-legacy-cookie-parser.js -o dist/ga-legacy-cookie-parser.min.js --comments '/GAParser\.js/' && node_modules/uglify-js/bin/uglifyjs build/ga-legacy-cookie-parser.js -o dist/ga-legacy-cookie-parser.pack.js --comments '/GAParser\.js/' --compress --mangle
